name: 铁甲鼹
description: 生活在地下矿脉中的小生物，皮肤已经进化成金属质地。挖掘速度惊人，常帮助矿工发现矿藏。

image_prompts.design: A small mole with silver-gray metallic skin. Drill-like iron claws, metal rivet patterns on back. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on metal plates, ink sketch texture on rivet patterns, non-reflective surface with matte steel gray tones, compact and sturdy digger.
